item.title: Graph of Mentors, Books and Authors
item.description: An interactive network graph consisting of authors, books and mentors based on recommendations in the book Tribe Of Mentors by Tim Ferriss and his interviewees.

item.title: Graph of Big Sister Cities With +1 Million Inhabitants
item.description: An interactive network graph showing 279 cities with more than 1 million inhabitants and how they are connected to their sister cities within this set.

item.title: Spaghetti Western Actors Network Graph DBpedia
item.description: This is an undirected graph of co-occurrences of actors who appeared in one or more Spaghetti Western films based on data from DBpedia retrieved on August 4, 2015.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2014
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences with language and language paradigm highlighting rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2013 Male Players Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted male football players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2013.

item.title: npm Top Packages Dependencies Graph
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the dependencies between npm packages, with at least 10 dependent packages, as of July 12, 2013 rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: npm Packages Dependencies Graph
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the dependencies between npm packages as of July 12, 2013 rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Geo Maps Drawn from IP Locations
item.description: Geographic maps of the world and most continents drawn based on an IP location dataset with 419433 records.

item.title: Visualisingdata Census Twitter Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of Twitter users who participated in the 1st data visualization census initiated by Andy Kirk, rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: A Decade of Climate Change in the Guardian
item.description: Explore a decade of climate change, global warming, natural disaster, extreme weather, pollution and deforestation in the articles published by the Guardian.
